trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed" /> and <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed" /> e de <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> event occurs when a designer finalizes a transaction.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> evento ocorre quando um designer Finaliza uma transação.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estados associados:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se a transação foi confirmada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class, using the specified value that indicates whether the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> usando o valor especificado que indica se o designer chamou <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> na transação.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estados associados:

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se a transação foi confirmada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se esta for a última transação a fechar; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: If `commit` is `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.LastTransaction%2A> property defaults to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `commit` é `true`, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.LastTransaction%2A> propriedade padroniza como `true`.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estados associados:

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this is the last transaction to close.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta é a última transação a ser fechada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se esta for a última transação fechar; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estados associados:

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o designer chamou <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> na transação.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer called <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> on the transaction; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer chamado <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit" /> na transação; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
